java/liquibase/database/structure/Index.java

00001 package liquibase.database.structure;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00004 
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import java.util.List;
00007 
00008 public class Index implements DatabaseObject, Comparable<Index> {
00009     private String name;
00010     private Table table;
00011     private List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
00012     private String filterCondition;
00013 
00014 
00015     public String getName() {
00016         return name;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public void setName(String name) {
00020         this.name = name;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public Table getTable() {
00024         return table;
00025     }
00026 
00027     public void setTable(Table table) {
00028         this.table = table;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public List<String> getColumns() {
00032         return columns;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getColumnNames() {
00036         return StringUtils.join(columns, ", ");
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getFilterCondition() {
00040         return filterCondition;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setFilterCondition(String filterCondition) {
00044         this.filterCondition = filterCondition;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00048         if (this == o) return true;
00049         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00050 
00051         Index index = (Index) o;
00052         boolean equals = true;
00053         for (String column : index.getColumns()) {
00054             if (!columns.contains(column)) {
00055                 equals = false;
00056             }
00057         }
00058 
00059         return equals && table.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(index.table.getName());
00060 
00061     }
00062 
00063     public int hashCode() {
00064         int result;
00065         result = table.getName().toUpperCase().hashCode();
00066         result = 31 * result + columns.hashCode();
00067         return result;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public int compareTo(Index o) {
00071         int returnValue = this.table.getName().compareTo(o.table.getName());
00072 
00073         if (returnValue == 0) {
00074             returnValue = this.getName().compareTo(o.getName());
00075         }
00076 
00077         //We should not have two indexes that have the same name and tablename
00078         /*if (returnValue == 0) {
00079                 returnValue = this.getColumnName().compareTo(o.getColumnName());
00080         }*/
00081 
00082 
00083         return returnValue;
00084     }
00085 
00086     public String toString() {
00087         StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00088         stringBuffer.append(getName()).append(" on ").append(table.getName()).append("(");
00089         for (String column : columns) {
00090             stringBuffer.append(column).append(", ");
00091         }
00092         stringBuffer.delete(stringBuffer.length() - 2, stringBuffer.length());
00093         stringBuffer.append(")");
00094         return stringBuffer.toString();
00095     }
00096 
00097 }
